column1: To perform all R analyses in "An extension of the Cx(Co)^m model of crossover patterning to account for experimental mortality in Drosophila melanogaster" there are six raw data input files in "Raw Data" folder
There are three scripts to run the analyses in "Code" folder
Please first load the #2 and #3 for custom functions of single and multi-locus analyse
The following output files will be written into the "Summaries and Outputs" folder
